SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent.misc

Class Lottery

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.misc.Lottery
public class Lottery extends Object
Handles selection of entrants for an event lottery.

Reads the entrant limit and current WAITING list from Firebase, then assigns entrants to INVITED or UNINVITED and removes them from WAITING. The status transitions are written atomically to Firebase to ensure consistency and minimize UI churn.

Firebase paths used:

  • Event/{eventId}/entrantLimit
  • WaitingList/{eventId}/WAITING/{uid}
  • WaitingList/{eventId}/INVITED/{uid}
  • WaitingList/{eventId}/UNINVITED/{uid}

Note: Authorization is not enforced here; callers should ensure only authorized users can run the lottery for a given event.
